topic.title: Al Brooks - Video Trading Course including password
topic.body:
Al Brooks full trading course, 53 videos, 5GB
https://brookstradingcourse.com

PASSWORD IS: camera

This torrent is not new and has been around for a while but many reported it as password protected. The contained instructions to get that password no longer works, ie the link "crazyshare.net/da14" is a scam.
Thanks to some awesome dictionaries and programs I was able to crack it.

Uploading it here since all fucking trackers and torrent sites out there make it impossible to upload or comment on existing torrents. Long live zeronet. And fuck those who protect rar archives with a password inside a torrent.
topic.torrent_file: data/users/17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92TaiY7X/Al Brooks - Video Trading Course no password.torrent

topic.title: [a-S] Ghost In The Shell - Stand Alone Complex (01-26) (1080p)
